title: I want free app review sites who will review my app and get good downloads as well? - Quora

response.answer_text: People in hell want ice water.   You are going to have to put your little beastie out into the world and let the users review it.   Probably you will end up giving V1.0 away for free to do this. Platform matters.  If android: Google Play, if iOS: iTunes, if MacOS: the App Store or MacUpdate, if Windows: CNET Download.com reviewers that offer "Best" which your app may not qualify: Find the best freeware fast - Gizmo's Freeware App news and reviews, best software downloads and discovery - Softonic
